name: etemenanki (mouse spirit)
description:
A and D and ARROWS to play.

Q to reset.

X to pause.

Jump, and sometimes hit.

Climb to level 100 before the tower disappears forever!

Your character is randomized.

Actually, most things are randomized and procedurally generated.

Even a 7 day moon cycle(phases of the moon,but in 7 days)

24 hour day cycle.Rain,clouds,wind,stars,grass,buncha stuff.

Infinite start screen variations, infinite level variations.

---------------READ BELOW-----------------------------------------------

----------BRICKS---------------

Moving Bricks- They move...

Cracked- Jump on and off quickly

Blue- Freezes you if you jump on (hit with your weapon to destroy/normalize)

Red- Changes blocks above it (hit with your weapon to activate)

Purple- Flashes on and off

White- Falls and hits you, killing you.

Black- Vaporizes you when touched.(hit with your weapon to destroy/normalize)
